name: Foundation of the Light
flavorText: Anajinn’s apprentice became Anajinn in her time, and the search for the Light continued.
flavorTextHtml: Anajinn’s apprentice became Anajinn in her time, and the search for the Light continued.
setDescription:
(2) Set:     
 Every use of Blessed Hammer that hits an enemy reduces the cooldown of Falling Sword and Provoke by 1 second.(4) Set:     
 You take 50% less damage for 8 seconds after landing with Falling Sword.(6) Set:     
 Increase the damage of Blessed Hammer by 15,000% and Falling Sword by 1000%.
setDescriptionHtml:
(2) Set:
Every use of Blessed Hammer that hits an enemy reduces the cooldown of Falling Sword and Provoke by 1 second.
(4) Set:
You take 50% less damage for 8 seconds after landing with Falling Sword.
(6) Set:
Increase the damage of Blessed Hammer by 15,000% and Falling Sword by 1000%.
